website_summaries.verdict: Warm and woody tones are accentuated by fresh scents like cucumber and hyacinth.
pros: A unique, modern scent that's a great choice for those who aren't fond of overly sweet scents
Even those who eschew florals love the subtle rose scent
cons: The scent was too under-powering for some

customer_reviews.title: No Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this perfume religiously for the past three years, so I am very familiar with what it should smell like.This time I decided to purchase it from Amazon. I was extremely disappointed to discover that this is some watered down version of the perfume. I tried it for three days, I shook the bottle to try and mix the contents, and it has no scent whatsoever. Won’t be purchasing my perfume from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: aforgione

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy Heart!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an exclusive Happy Heart wearer for years, THIS IS NOT HAPPY HEART, and it smells noting even close. I would like a refund but seems there is no way to contact the seller. And I posted this post months ago and it never showed up on comments. Total waste of hard earned money!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Total rip off!!! This is not Happy Heart. It is nothing more than slightly scented water. Doesn't smell like HH and the scent it does have only lasts about 5 minutes. I actually bought a bottle from the Clinique counter at Dillards to compare and they are absolutely nothing alike. This isn't even good enough to be called a knock off. Amazon needs to delete this item. I threw the box away so can't even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume and Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read a couple of reviews and was surprised to see that there were a few comments saying it wasn't the real deal, or they felt it was watered down and not what they expected. I have to say that I have ordered this previously, now on my 4th order and I have been very pleased with the product. It's the only perfume that I wear and I always receive compliments on its fragrance. I love it and very happy with the whole process of purchasing and have received right on the time expected.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Value!
customer_reviews.text: Never had so many compliments from both male and female - I'm 52 and even got compliment from a young man at a drive thru window..He said "ma'am may I ask what perfume you are wearing it is really nice"...LOL Made my day. Package came when expected. Arrived NEW in excellent shape, no crushed box. Would buy from this seller again. Very happy with Happy Heart!
customer_reviews.author: Just4kjs

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I have complained several times that the top of the bottle around the neck of the bottle was cracked and leaked. Nothing was ever done. I paid for a full bottle of perfume not a half bottle. Gave up on trying to get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: diane johnson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have same formula as department stores...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have same formula as department stores...this is my signature scent. It's a soft beautiful smell and would stay on me all day. With this formula it smells like it should in the beginning but after an hour it's gone. This is not the same as the department store and I know because I have been wearing this for over 10 years...
customer_reviews.author: D.S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the real deal to me! Fragrance lasts for hours, it's always been my favorite scent!
customer_reviews.author: BusyBones

customer_reviews.title: It’ll bring your ex back
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely favorite scent. Everyone knows my “scent” and my ex even knew i was at the same bar he walked into because he said he could smell a faint scent and knew it was me. Strong and long lasting, seductive floral and heavenly. 10 10 recommend. And yes i slept with my ex that night :) he was on the hunt from that lingering fragrance at the bar - i had been outside also when he came into the pool hall ;) it’s that good
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Much less expensive than in the stores.
customer_reviews.text: Love this floral fragrance. and it is a nice change from Happy which is citrusy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dalton

customer_reviews.title: If smelling like a State Fair after dark is your thing
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique but like many of their scents -It’s not for everyone. Cloyingly sweet citrus-floral scent. Great if you just wanna gift it to a young girl, or use it on your bedsheets or as a room/car upholstery spritzer but smells like well worn lady of the evening whose worn her fair share of cheap perfumes ... gah.
customer_reviews.author: TC Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Happy Heart Perfume - Makes a Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for our daughter, and she is very happy. The perfume scent is excellent - so she is happy, and the price was very reasonable - so we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G Gammell

customer_reviews.title: 100% Authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle from this buyer and it is authentic and is the BEST perfume ever. I love it 100% I have no idea why people would say it's a knock off. Not at all <3
customer_reviews.author: Khristina Martin

customer_reviews.title: clinique Happy Heart
customer_reviews.text: this my all time favorite perfume most refreshing I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bass

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love Clinique brand. This is the only perfume I wear. I've been using this perfume for over 20 years. Everyone tells how much they love the scent. Highly recommend this perfume You will get complaints.
customer_reviews.author: j ro

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite perfume! I haven't had it in months, so I decided it was time to order it. It was nicely wrapped and didn't have any signs of damage on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...or gift
customer_reviews.text: My sister worked for Clinique about 15 years ago, that is when I fell in love with Happy heart. I have used it since. I always got it at Macy's but wanted to try it on Amazon because the price was great. DON'T BE FOOLED,this is not the same. At all. I have been very disappointed....I even bought it twice to see if it was just the one bottle. Guys....order this at the Clinique official website if your malls are closed.. like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be legit
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume. I always buy in the department store, but when I was having trouble locating it, I turned to good ol’ Amazon. The fragrance appears to be the real deal, so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has loved this scent for many years. I saw it at a better price on Amazon, so decided to order for her as a gift. This perfume is 100% authentic and smells absolutely amazing. Lasts for a long time too!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian "SpookYouLaterz" Lubecki

customer_reviews.title: Scent lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted this perfume, but never wanted to pay the department store price for it. I was pleasantly surprise me when the Amazon sold version of it was EXACTLY like the one I always spritz while walking through Macy’s!
customer_reviews.author: nicolehula

customer_reviews.title: Delightful, Fresh Scent
customer_reviews.text: I get more compliments when I wear this perfume. It is such a light citrus smell -- not like a cleaning solution -- but just a sweet smell that people really like. I have worn it for years, and never get tired of wearing it -- or the compliments I receive.
customer_reviews.author: A faithful Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not overpowering, but also not so subtle.
customer_reviews.text: I have found my signature scent that I will be wearing everyday. This scent stays on for six to eight hours minimum. It is not overpowering, but it is not so subtle that you and others won't notice the smell hours later. I will be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: pocket

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm.. Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells absolutely amazing! I have never worn/smelt this perfume before this purchase. I bought based off the reviews. It really smells great, light, and fresh! I love when I go into my closet and grab a jacket that I used this on mmmm! You won't regret!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears the original Happy by Clinique and I got this for her as a change of pace. The fragrance is nice but I still believe the original is better.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Guerrieri

customer_reviews.title: love this perfume!!!
customer_reviews.text: The perfume is wonderful and smells beautiful and fresh and last all day!! I will definitely order again. Its perfect for work because its not so strong that its over whelming. It sfresh and smells clean and preety like flowers!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: It smells way to flowery almost lilac and barely any type of clean smell. I gave this to my 67 year old mother and she loves it. I would only recommend it if you like that lilac smell.. that is just overpowering
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance and ordered this item. Really like it! It was packed well. The perfume was sealed just like in the store. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marty N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite - floraly and citrusy without being old lady.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Lyons

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sent EVER
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love I used my first bottle dry and had to buy more
customer_reviews.author: Amber Van Wagenen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Flowery
customer_reviews.text: Love this smell but can be too strong when you put too much on, just putting it on light is enough for all day!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent! I’ve never found a perfume that I could tolerate all day long, but by the evening I’m wishing that it wasn’t wearing off! The smell is clean and just a little bit floral - so so amazing! The longevity is pretty good, I can smell it on me (without smelling my skin directly) for 5-8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Carey

customer_reviews.title: Clean with a hint of Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love these Clinque Happy scents. This one, HAPPY HEART is light, clean, & subtle powder scent. HAPPY smells similar, but without the powdery scent.
customer_reviews.author: JZV

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but I’ve used this fragrance for YEARS, and this bottle is way too faint of scent. I thought the price was too good to be true and it surely is! I would like to return it for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Tracy McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is watered down so much you can barley smell it. Nothing like same brand that I buy from big dept stores. You pay more but you get something you feel good about. Jj
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous that this would be counterfeit, but this seems like genuine product - it looks and smells exactly like the Happy Heart I purchased at Macy's.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Sad it's being discontinued!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fragrance of Clinique. I've been purchasing and wearing it for many years now (since they first introduced it). I always get compliments on how it smells. I'm so sad that Clinique is discontinuing it! Glad I can still purchase it here!
customer_reviews.author: chp

customer_reviews.title: Favorite scent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a light pleasant smell that lasts all day. Great for those that are sensitive to smell and allergic to life like I am. Totally safe for all the bubble children!
customer_reviews.author: SeeYouBrokeItLook

customer_reviews.title: This is not the real scent😡
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this Purdue from Macy’s but noticed right away that it’s not the same smell. This perfume smell different and has a cheap smell. I’m very unhappy with this purchase due to the fact that I purchased for my cruise a February 27th and couldn’t wear it but one night only. The smell is awful and would love to find out why we’re not told at the beginning of the purchase that’s it’s a knockoff to the real perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Item was as expected! Not watered down like some reviews I have seen of other perfumes purchased online.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Keck

customer_reviews.title: It is not fake
customer_reviews.text: Personally think the scents more like a cologone at first. Is very strong but at the end, it smell different, more like a flower scent. Is last very long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely my favorite scent ever! Does not Bother my allergies and I get tons of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Kenzi H.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think this perfume smelled as good as I remembered from trying it in the store
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn't think this perfume smelled as good as I remembered from trying it in the store...however, it quickly grew on me and now I love it. I get compliments every time I wear it. It is very fresh and great for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.author: gijo

customer_reviews.title: Happy Clinique made a Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my wife. She loves the product and the scent. Will buy again for if and when needed. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RENO VILLA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for someone who usually wears Happy. They love Happy Heart even better.
customer_reviews.author: woody

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and my wife really loves it. It’s her favorite and she has been wearing it for years
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome perfume and priced well since it is an older perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfume!
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume, and this was a quality purchase at a discount. LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Grays

customer_reviews.title: Not the original!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a faithful customer of Clinique happy heart for over a decade. And this is a cheap imitation. Scent does not last, it smells like a knockoff as soon as you spray it. I love the original I would highly recommend buying it from a department store.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Perez

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this perfume. Haven't found anything I like better!
customer_reviews.author: malia

customer_reviews.title: smells good
customer_reviews.text: this is my favorite fragrance it is light and kinda sweet smell not as heavy as clinque happy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as clinique happy heart
customer_reviews.text: This particular one is not the same. The cap is a different color than pictured. The scent last like cheap body spray. I usually order from Amazon and I ordered from this seller by mistake. I cannot return the item because it contains alcohol. This is my favorite perfume but the one I received is similar but not the same nor the strength of the original.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this one and the Happy one they both smell really good
customer_reviews.author: Melody Lynn Reese

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this perfume! Every time I wear it someone always compliments the smell, and it last all day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash with the Smell!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The smell not there i spray me at night and my husband said u didn't put on perfume i said yes i did but he couldn't smell it and spray alot as usual but no smell i love to smell good for me and my husband this batch was trash!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Nwachukwu

customer_reviews.title: This is not real happy heart
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed this is not Clinique happy heart perfume. I had a little bit of happy heart left, it smells nothing like the real perfume. It has a bug spray smell and my skin broke out from using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend Happy Heart
customer_reviews.text: Been using this fragrance for over 20 years. I always get compliments on it everytime I wear it. It smells like summer. Kind of citrus and flowers, but not strong.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I found this perfume online at a much more reasonable price than I usually pay in a department store. It is one of my favorite perfumes!
customer_reviews.author: Britt M.

customer_reviews.title: Very subtle scent
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scent! I’m sensitive to strong scents but this is a long time favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Best long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: This scent last for hours if not the next day! I absolutely love this and will also spray in my hair ! I love this scent and the only perfume I have purchased that last for a day
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay holt

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Happy Heart
customer_reviews.text: One my favorite perfume in the world. Clean smelling and Always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bass

customer_reviews.title: Once Again 100% Authentic Ladies!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I ordered this perfume from this seller!...once again it’s 100% Authentic ladies!...will continue to keep buying!...so glad I found this deal on my favorite perfume!...I get so many compliments daily on this perfume!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I saw all the other reviews saying it wasn't the real deal. Anyway, turns out it seems exactly the same to me! I sprayed about three sprits on a t-shirt after a shower and I wore it all night even to bed and the next morning it still smelled amazing! I even wore it the next day with about one or two sprits and my friend said she could smell it even after a while! So I definitely recommened
customer_reviews.author: Jules R

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I just love all the Happy fragrances They are not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: dolly1055

customer_reviews.title: Happy Heart
customer_reviews.text: I love Happy in all the scents but this one is my very favorite
customer_reviews.author: Eva Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Cracked perfume bottle upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! However when I opened my box, the perfume bottle had a crack 😟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this scent! It smells fresh and lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if they've changed the formula on this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they've changed the formula on this perfume or if it is just me but it seems a lot stronger and more flowery then ever when I got this bottle. Maybe it's fake I don't know but it's not the same as my last bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamydoodles

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I already have bought and used Happy Heart before, so I knew I liked it. It smells wonderful and isn’t heavy scent for summer.
customer_reviews.author: jodell ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Memorable
customer_reviews.text: I don't think a day has past when I wore this fragrance and didn't receive a compliment on it. It is light and fresh, non intrusive yet notable. My signature scent for years
customer_reviews.author: Soraya

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Great price & it smells wonderful. Refreshing & clean smell
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: smells like the expensive stuff to me!
customer_reviews.text: Since I've found out amazon sells my Clinique Happy and Happy Heart, I haven't been back and paid high dollar for it at Belk or Ulta! I have never had a bad bottle come my way, They are always full up to the top, and always smell just like it would if I had paid 80 bucks for it at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These products are not expired!
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about getting this at such a low price but it is perfect! Same great scent perfectly packaged as if it were from the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best perfume EVER
customer_reviews.text: I constantly get compliments for this scent when I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Amble

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Smell is light & Smells Very Good & last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shavon Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great perfume at a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh clean scent. Not overpowering, but just a couple sprits goes a long way. Long lasting. Super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It's real
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of comments and the smell is the same as the clinic store. I compared it to a bottle that I brought from Macys, and its exactly the same. This is one of my favorite perfumes.
customer_reviews.author: Dezeri Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Quality prodcut
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as expected, and was packaged safely as not to break during transit. The product itself is a quality item, nice scent worthy of the name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Wigina67

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE HAPPY HEARY :-))
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely sent, clean and different. I think you will love it too. Happy Heart is my everyday parfum.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B

customer_reviews.title: My go to perfume
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume of all time. Nice pleasant scent that’s not overpowering when you put it on. I get lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa SCSunnyDaze

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product! I’ve used this perfume for 15 years and this my first time ordering from Amazon. I will never order it again. Smells nothing like the perfume. It smells just like rubbing alcohol. There is no scent to it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ready Set Go

customer_reviews.title: Makes my Heart Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite perfume since I found it in college. I get daily compliments on it. I'll always love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent. Hate going to the department store for Clinique, so this was a great option
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dougherty Sheff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been altered in some way that leaves an odd, trailing, afterscent. I’ve already re-purchased through a different retailer; what a waste of money this was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you'll get a boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Smells delightful, great scent and came very quick! I love this perfume!
customer_reviews.author: SurfEr

customer_reviews.title: What a scam, the bottle is clearly diluted! ...
customer_reviews.text: What a scam, the bottle is clearly diluted! I usually buy at a Dept Store and lasts all day with only 1 squirt of the bottle. This one barely smells of anything and fades immediately. Very disappointing!! I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with my order of Happy Heart 3 4 oz bottle, I normally love my happy heart but this was not the perfume I always order?did not even have the pretty pink color to the bottle??? I would like to be compensated for it
customer_reviews.author: LISA KOSTOHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Best Price
customer_reviews.text: Literally found this off scentbird and fell in love. I had to have it and not spend a bank load... best price around. scent lasts all day and doesnt cause headaches.. ladies you know what i mean lol
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: I have always had a great experience using Amazon so it saddens me to write ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a great experience using Amazon so it saddens me to write this review. I have been using Clinique Happy Heart since it came out and have always loved the way it reacts with my body Chemistry leaving a fresh fragrance for hours. The bottle I just received does not have a lasting smell and fades within the first 15 minutes of putting it on. I am not sure if it's just a bad batch or a knock-off but it is not the same Happy Heart I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Balaja

customer_reviews.title: Lovely❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume. I paid double at a makeup store. I get complements on this fragrance every time I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy wife that smells like heaven.
customer_reviews.text: This gift was for my wife. She loves happy fragrance line. Not to mention as male it's that fragrance that makes me look around to see where my wife is. When she wears happy it will stop me in my track soon as she walks by .
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love, love this perfume. The smell is so feminine and floral.
customer_reviews.author: King Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: False
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset for the last purchase made by me of a 3.3 fl oz of a Happy Heart By Clinique For Woman, Parfum Spray 3.4 Ounces. The Box look was old. The scent was not of the usual scent. Now smells more like a wooden perfume. I’m very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Peralta

customer_reviews.title: My very favorite scent !
customer_reviews.text: This is my signature scent, great price & fast shipping !
customer_reviews.author: Shopping girl 57

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and my hubby loves it, but it doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Maria Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice fresh smelling cologne.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Clinique products and this cologne is light and fresh smelling
customer_reviews.author: Susan Chojnacki

customer_reviews.title: Floral clinique scent mix
customer_reviews.text: If you like floral clinique and something else... Hmmm. Not for me
customer_reviews.author: Laura and Kenny Shreffler

customer_reviews.title: seemed not as strong as sampled in store, didn't last that long...
customer_reviews.text: i wondered , for the first time, if by getting it on Amazon, it was not authentic, or is somehow lower quality than a store bought perfume.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Happy Heart for over 10 years. It’s my absolute favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed and embarrassed to have given this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife for Christmas and the product is a knock-off!! The scent is weak and does not last. I am extremely disappointed and embarrassed to have given this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This will be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been out of this for years and it is the only thing she requested for Christmas. This will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

product_meta.title: Happy Heart By Clinique For Women. Parfum Spray 3.4 Ounces
product_meta.description: Size:3.4 Fl OzIntroduced in 2003. Fragrance notes: sandalwood, mandarin and cucumber, green and fresh. Recommended use: casual. When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
feature_bullets: Launched by the design house of Clinique
A blend of mandarin orange, cassia, cucumber, primula, carrot, water hyacinth, sandalwood, and white woods notes
It is Ideal for casual wear
It is Suitable for all skin types
Packaging for this product may vary from that shown in the image above
This item is not for sale in Catalina Island
